summary: WHILE DRIVING MY CAR, HIGHWAY OR SIDE STREETS, I GET A NUMBER OF DIFFERENT WARNING LIGHTS, ALL DEALING WITH MY TIRES AND BRAKING SYSTEM. I TOOK MY CAR TO THE DEALERSHIP, AND WAS TOLD THERE IS A RECALL ON THE ABS. I CHECK MY CAR IN FOR REPAIRS, WAITED, LEFT AND SUPPOSING EVERYTHING WAS BACK TO NORMAL JUST TO GET ON THE ROAD THE NEXT DAY AND GET THE EXACT SAME PROBLEM. TOOK IT DIRECT TO THE DEALERSHIP, JUST TO FIND OUT ALL THEY DID WAS JUST REPROGRAMMED MY CAR TO GET THE LIGHTS OFF. AT THIS POINT AND TIME, THE SER VICE DEPARTMENT WAS CLOSED, SO I RETURNED THE NEXT DAY, WAITED FOR 4 HOURS JUST TO FIND OUT 'IT'S GOING TO COST ME $300-500 AND 2 HOURS ' TO REPAIR BUT THEY DON'T HAVE THE PART. ALL OF THIS STARTED ON SATURDAY 11/09/2019.
